member.name: T:C1.Chart.GradientColorScaleBase
member.summary: Base class for gradient color scale.

member.name: T:C1.Chart.DiscreteColorScaleBase
member.summary: Base class for discrete color scale.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap
member.summary: Represents heatmap series that displays 2D data array using color variations.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of Heatmap class.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.StartX
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting data x-value. The default value is -0.5.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.StartY
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting data y-value. The default value is -0.5.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.StepX
member.summary: Gets or sets the data step by x-coordinate. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.StepY
member.summary: Gets or sets the data step by y-coordinate. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.ColorScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the color scale for the heatmap. The color scale defines trasformation from data value to color.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.Heatmap.GetItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the series data item by index.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.ColorAxis.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of ColorAxis class.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.GradientColorScale.Colors
member.summary: Get or sets the list of colors for the scale.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.GradientColorScale.Axis
member.summary: Gets or sets the color axis for the scale.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Interval
member.summary: Represents an interval for discrete color scale.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Interval.Color
member.summary: Gets or set the color of the interval.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Interval.Max
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum of the interval.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Interval.Min
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum of the interval.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Interval.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the interval. The name is displayed in the chart legend.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Interval.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Windows.Media.Color,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of Interval class.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Chart.Extended.DiscreteColorScale.Intervals
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of intervals defining the discrete color scale.
